name: Pink Damask Playmoss theme
description: This playmoss theme features a damask lace-like patterned background in pink & grey. It features dashed borders, larger text, rounded icons and a pink, grey and white color palette. This theme is not recommended for those with contrast issues, but I think the visibility of the theme is otherwise good. Everything on the code is commented for complete customization if the contrast is not sufficient.
additional_info:
No centered text this time because playmoss updated their margins so that you can't have both the feed mini-playlists and the main page playlists properly centered. :/

2/10 - Color tweaks.
